From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia


Hindi-language biographical film on political leader


Main Mulayam Singh YadavDirected bySuvendu Raj GhoshProduced byMeena Sethi MondalStarringAmyth SethiProductioncompanyMs ProductionRelease date
29 January 2021 (2021-01-29)
Running time146 minutesCountryIndiaLanguageHindi
Main Mulayam Singh Yadav (transl. I am Mulayam Singh Yadav) is a 2021 Indian Hindi-language biographical film directed by Suvendu Raj Ghosh. The film shows the political journey of Mulayam Singh Yadav.[1] Produced by Meena Sethi Mondal,[2] it stars Amyth Sethi, Govind Namdeo, Mukesh Tiwari, Prakash Belawadi, Supriya Karnik, Sayaji Shinde, Rajkumar Kanojia, Zarina Wahab, Anupam Shyam, and Mimoh Chakraborty.[3][4] This film was initially set to release on 14 August 2020[5] but was postponed to 2 October.[6] The film release was further delayed due to the COVID-19 pandemic and was theatrical released on 29 January 2021.[7][8]

Cast[edit]
Amyth Sethi as Mulayam Singh Yadav
Sana Amin Sheikh as Malti Mulayam Singh Yadav
Govind Namdeo as Chaudhary Charan Singh
Mukesh Tiwari as Nathuram
Prakash Belawadi as Ram Manohar Lohia
Supriya Karnik as Indira Gandhi
Kiran Jhangiani as Sanjay Gandhi
Ranojoy Bishnu as Ajit Singh
Sayaji Shinde as Advocate Lakhan Singh
Rajkumar Kanojia as Darshan Singh
Mimoh as Shivpal Singh Yadav
Prerna Sethi Mandal as Sarla Shivpal Yadav
Gopal Singh as Ramgopal Yadav
Zarina Wahab as Mulayam Singh Yadav's mother
Anupam Shyam as Mulayam Singh Yadav's father
Debdas as Ramroop
Vimal Bhatia as Devkant Barua
Chittrali Das as Kamla Devi Yadav/Chutki (Mulayam Singh Yadav's sister)
Mahima Gupta as Maya Tyagi
Harshat Miami as Siddhartha Shankar Ray
References[edit]


^ "Main Mulayam Singh Yadav: अब 'नेताजी' की ज़िंदगी बड़े पर्दे पर, रिलीज़ हुआ बायोपिक का मोशन पोस्टर". Dainik Jagran (in Hindi). Retrieved 9 June 2020.

^ Hungama, Bollywood (6 April 2020). "Main Mulayam Singh Yadav movie teaser out now : Bollywood News - Bollywood Hungama". Bollywood Hungama. Retrieved 9 June 2020.

^ "पीएम मोदी के बाद अब मुलायम सिंह यादव पर भी बनेगी फिल्म, टीजर आया सामने". Amar Ujala (in Hindi). Retrieved 9 June 2020.

^ Awasthi, Aishwarya (7 April 2020). "पीएम मोदी के बाद यूपी के इस पूर्व दिग्गज CM पर बनेगी फिल्म, दमदार टीजर हुआ रिलीज". Lokmat News Hindi (in Hindi). Retrieved 9 June 2020.

^ "रिलीज हुआ 'Main Mulayam Singh Yadav' का मोशन पोस्टर, इस दिन सिनेमाघरों में दस्तक देगी फिल्म". Zee News Hindi. 23 April 2020. Retrieved 9 June 2020.

^ "'Main Mulayam Singh Yadav' trailer out, film to release on 2nd October". ANI. 15 July 2020. Retrieved 15 August 2020.

^ "Mulayam Singh's biopic set for release in Uttar Pradesh on January 29". Hindustan Times. 22 January 2021. Retrieved 26 January 2021.

^ "Bengali director insists film on Mulayam has no political agenda". Times of India. 11 February 2021. Retrieved 27 February 2021.
